summary: Late one night, two young toughs hold hostage the passengers in one car of a New York subway train.
cast: Tony Musante|Martin Sheen|Beau Bridges|Brock Peters|Ruby Dee|Jack Gilford|Thelma Ritter|Ed McMahon|Diana Van der Vlis|Mike Kellin|Jan Sterling|Gary Merrill|Robert Fields|Robert Bannard|Victor Arnold|Donna Mills|Kathleen Smith|Henry Proach|Neal Hynes|Ben Levi|Marty Meyers|Don De Leo|Ted Lawrie|John Servetnik|Ray Cole|Barry Del Rae|Nico Hartos|Maxine McCrey|Nina Hansen
title: El incidente
